ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | uc1pdeg.d | |- D = ( deg1 ` R ) |

| 3 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ F e. C ) -> R e. Ring ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Poly1 ` R ) = ( Poly1 ` R ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` ( Poly1 ` R ) ) = ( Base ` ( Poly1 ` R ) ) |

| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 0g ` ( Poly1 ` R ) ) = ( 0g ` ( Poly1 ` R ) ) |

| 10 | 9 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ F e. C ) -> F =/= ( 0g ` ( Poly1 ` R ) ) ) |
| 11 | 1, 4, 8, 5 | #P_deg1nn0cl | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ F e. ( Base ` ( Poly1 ` R ) ) /\ F =/= ( 0g ` ( Poly1 ` R ) ) ) -> ( D ` F ) e. NN0 ) |
| 12 | 3, 7, 10, 11 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ F e. C ) -> ( D ` F ) e. NN0 ) |
